name: .QP File Extension
summary: Learn about .QP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a QP file in Quaver (Windows, Mac). To do so, open Quaver and drag the file into the game. The mapset your QP file contains will then be selectable in-game as both a playable and editable level.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
